text: Ezɨ amɨmzaraghan bar mɨzaraghara, Abraham dagheba inigha egha memen inir me dɨpam tuasa isamizim ini. Egha an dɨpam tuigha, da isa Hagarɨn dɨpɨzim gatɨ. Egha a borim isa a ganigha aning amadazɨ aning zui. Ezɨ Hagar Berseban nguibamɨn amadaghan gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganim bar a garui.21:14 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
